content_security_policy: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://*.google.com https://*.gstatic.com; font-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; connect-src 'self' https: http://*.aimcdn.me http://connectivitycheck.android.com http://*.lunrac.com http://*.postls.com http://*.tcdn.me http://example.com http://www.root-servers.org
name: Browsec VPN - Free VPN for Firefox
description: Browsec VPN is a Firefox VPN extension that protects your IP from Internet threats and lets you browse privately for free.
